channel.title: Umm need a host
channel.description:
i dont no if this is in the right place but i need sum1 to host protonscape v2 cos ive got a rooter and cant get hamchi to work
hopefully it wont need hamachi also the hoster shud leave the server on 24/7ish and for updates i shall send them the client and stuff that ive edited
hope ppl help
ps whoever hosts the server can be a co owner
